page.title: 16ARABLE FARMING II.
page.content: This year our summer season began late,and many of the crops are not as far on as they have been in previous years.This will make harvesting time late and many farmers are hoping for an improvement in the weather.A wet Autumn could spoil a lot of the root crops if they are still in the fields. Not all the farmers have their own Combined Harvesters and Balers,and hire machinery from local Agriculural Suppliers in{MALTON,DRIFFIELD}or{YORK. Harvest-time is a very busy time and some of the farmers work together to get all their crops in before the bad weather comes. The{AGRICULTURAL SHOWS}are popular with all areas of the public as they include many things,eg.Gymkhana,Pets, and Flowers as well as all the trade tents for the farmers.They provide an enjoyable outing for all communities.
